00029 class NetworkDevice : public Device
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     boost::asio::io_service io_service;
00033     tcp::socket socket;
00034 
00035     NetworkDevice(const char *address)
00036     : socket(io_service)
00037     {
00038         stringstream portstr;
00039         portstr << SERVER_PORT;
00040 
00041         tcp::resolver resolver(io_service);
00042         tcp::resolver::query query(address, portstr.str());
00043         tcp::resolver::iterator endpoint_iterator = resolver.resolve(query);
00044         tcp::resolver::iterator end;
00045 
00046         boost::system::error_code error = boost::asio::error::host_not_found;
00047         while(error && endpoint_iterator != end)
00048         {
00049             socket.close();
00050             socket.connect(*endpoint_iterator++, error);
00051         }
00052         if(error)
00053             throw boost::system::system_error(error);
00054     }
00055 
00056     ~NetworkDevice()
00057     {
00058     }
00059 
00060     void mem_alloc(device_memory& mem, MemoryType type)
00061     {
00062 #if 0
00063         RPCSend snd(socket, "mem_alloc");
00064 
00065         snd.archive & size & type;
00066         snd.write();
00067 
00068         RPCReceive rcv(socket);
00069 
00070         device_ptr mem;
00071         *rcv.archive & mem;
00072 
00073         return mem;
00074 #endif
00075     }

00123     void const_copy_to(const char *name, void *host, size_t size)

00188     void task_add(DeviceTask& task)
00189     {
00190         if(task.type == DeviceTask::TONEMAP)
00191             tonemap(task.x, task.y, task.w, task.h, task.rgba, task.buffer, task.sample, task.resolution);
00192         else if(task.type == DeviceTask::PATH_TRACE)
00193             path_trace(task.x, task.y, task.w, task.h, task.buffer, task.rng_state, task.sample);
00194     }
00195 
00196     void task_wait()
00197     {
00198     }
00199 
00200     void task_cancel()
00201     {
00202     }

00205 Device *device_network_create(DeviceInfo& info, const char *address)
00206 {
00207     return new NetworkDevice(address);
00208 }
00209 
00210 void device_network_info(vector<DeviceInfo>& devices)
00211 {
00212     DeviceInfo info;
00213 
00214     info.type = DEVICE_NETWORK;
00215     info.description = "Network Device";
00216     info.id = "NETWORK";
00217     info.num = 0;
00218 
00219     devices.push_back(info);
00220 }

00222 void Device::server_run()
00223 {
00224     try
00225     {
00226         /* starts thread that responds to discovery requests */
00227         ServerDiscovery discovery;
00228 
00229         for(;;)
00230         {
00231 
00232             /* accept connection */
00233             boost::asio::io_service io_service;
00234             tcp::acceptor acceptor(io_service, tcp::endpoint(tcp::v4(), SERVER_PORT));
00235 
00236             tcp::socket socket(io_service);
00237             acceptor.accept(socket);
00238 
00239             /* receive remote function calls */
00240             for(;;) {
00241                 RPCReceive rcv(socket);
00242 
00243                 if(rcv.name == "description") {
00244                     string desc = description();
00245 
00246                     RPCSend snd(socket);
00247                     snd.archive & desc;
00248                     snd.write();
00249                 }
00250                 else if(rcv.name == "mem_alloc") {
00251 #if 0
00252                     MemoryType type;
00253                     size_t size;
00254                     device_ptr mem;
00255 
00256                     *rcv.archive & size & type;
00257                     mem = mem_alloc(size, type);
00258 
00259                     RPCSend snd(socket);
00260                     snd.archive & mem;
00261                     snd.write();
00262 #endif
00263                 }
00264                 else if(rcv.name == "mem_copy_to") {
00265 #if 0
00266                     device_ptr mem;
00267                     size_t size;
00268 
00269                     *rcv.archive & mem & size;
00270 
00271                     vector<char> host_vector(size);
00272                     rcv.read_buffer(&host_vector[0], size);
00273 
00274                     mem_copy_to(mem, &host_vector[0], size);
00275 #endif
00276                 }
00277                 else if(rcv.name == "mem_copy_from") {
00278 #if 0
00279                     device_ptr mem;
00280                     size_t offset, size;
00281 
00282                     *rcv.archive & mem & offset & size;
00283 
00284                     vector<char> host_vector(size);
00285 
00286                     mem_copy_from(&host_vector[0], mem, offset, size);
00287 
00288                     RPCSend snd(socket);
00289                     snd.write();
00290                     snd.write_buffer(&host_vector[0], size);
00291 #endif
00292                 }
00293                 else if(rcv.name == "mem_zero") {
00294 #if 0
00295                     device_ptr mem;
00296                     size_t size;
00297 
00298                     *rcv.archive & mem & size;
00299                     mem_zero(mem, size);
00300 #endif
00301                 }
00302                 else if(rcv.name == "mem_free") {
00303 #if 0
00304                     device_ptr mem;
00305 
00306                     *rcv.archive & mem;
00307                     mem_free(mem);
00308 #endif
00309                 }
00310                 else if(rcv.name == "const_copy_to") {
00311                     string name_string;
00312                     size_t size;
00313 
00314                     *rcv.archive & name_string & size;
00315 
00316                     vector<char> host_vector(size);
00317                     rcv.read_buffer(&host_vector[0], size);
00318 
00319                     const_copy_to(name_string.c_str(), &host_vector[0], size);
00320                 }
00321                 else if(rcv.name == "tex_alloc") {
00322 #if 0
00323                     string name_string;
00324                     DataType datatype;
00325                     device_ptr mem;
00326                     size_t width, height;
00327                     int components;
00328                     bool interpolation;
00329 
00330                     *rcv.archive & name_string & width & height & datatype & components & interpolation;
00331 
00332                     size_t size = width*height*components*datatype_size(datatype);
00333 
00334                     vector<char> host_vector(size);
00335                     rcv.read_buffer(&host_vector[0], size);
00336 
00337                     mem = tex_alloc(name_string.c_str(), &host_vector[0], width, height, datatype, components, interpolation);
00338 
00339                     RPCSend snd(socket);
00340                     snd.archive & mem;
00341                     snd.write();
00342 #endif
00343                 }
00344                 else if(rcv.name == "tex_free") {
00345 #if 0
00346                     device_ptr mem;
00347 
00348                     *rcv.archive & mem;
00349                     tex_free(mem);
00350 #endif
00351                 }
00352                 else if(rcv.name == "path_trace") {
00353 #if 0
00354                     device_ptr buffer, rng_state;
00355                     int x, y, w, h;
00356                     int sample;
00357 
00358                     *rcv.archive & x & y & w & h & buffer & rng_state & sample;
00359                     path_trace(x, y, w, h, buffer, rng_state, sample);
00360 #endif
00361                 }
00362                 else if(rcv.name == "tonemap") {
00363 #if 0
00364                     device_ptr rgba, buffer;
00365                     int x, y, w, h;
00366                     int sample, resolution;
00367 
00368                     *rcv.archive & x & y & w & h & rgba & buffer & sample & resolution;
00369                     tonemap(x, y, w, h, rgba, buffer, sample, resolution);
00370 #endif
00371                 }
00372             }
00373         }
00374     }
00375     catch(exception& e)
00376     {
00377         cerr << "Network server exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00378     }
00379 }
